content.detailedDescription:
Starting on december 19, 2013, and continuing every night for over a week, i heard a deep-pitched droning sound, punctuated by a loud, but muffled boom. sometimes the boom only happened once or twice. other times, it would sound a number of times, in rapid succession. this went on almost night for over a month. it then became several times a week, and continues to this day. i heard it this morning, at about 4:30am, and listened to it for an hour. there was no boom today...Just the deep-pitched droning sound. my husband has even heard it a couple of times.
as for the direction of the sound, it seems to be from above, kind of in an "umbrella" sort of way.
over the last month or so, i have contacted patrick air force base...Nasa...A tech person who works for a local gas company...The 2 local airports...None of these folks had an explanation for the sound. however, the nasa person said that i was the 3rd or 4th person to call nasa about a "loud, deep humming sound and some weird explosions". i have reported this already to my local mufon investigator...Dinah lechner...And we have been working on it together. i would like to have her remain my case investigator.
thank you for any help you can give with this mystery.
content.summary: Deep pitched droning sound punctuated by loud, muffled booms

content.detailedDescription: I was in conyers, georgia (rockdale county) taking my dog out to use the bathroom when i was on my cell phone when i started getting strange noises on my phone and then the call dropped. thats when looked up to the sky (which i do every night to look at the stars) when i noticed at a very close range (tree top distance) red lights in a formation (in a line) with one white light that did not blink or anything. the white light was consistent. my first thought was jets flying in formation until i realized there was no sound and also that i could not see the object that the lights were coming from at all. it was as if the whole thing was invisable except  for the lights.  i then started to follow the lights (which were not traveling fast at all) as far as i could to the vineyard behind my house, which allowed me to see this at a greater distance. it was huge, like five times the size of our airplanes today. at a distance over the clearing i could see how it was actually a sphere shaped object based on how the red-orange lights moved around it. there were six red-orange lights with one white in the center and the way the lights faded in and out was not how any of our planes do today. plus, the size and color was different. i was never the type of person who never believed in ufo's until like i always said "if i see one" and now i did. the other thing that was strange was this event only lasted about ten minutes but after it all i noticed my dog was gone for over an hour which was very strange. he is a well trained dog and never runs off. after this though i have been getting some of the worse headaches ever and a sense that their (ufo) presence here on earth is more then the human race understands. i have this unknown knowledge as to why all of this is happening and why it is actually occuring a lot more at an alarming rate. these things communicate at a much higher frequency and know things that only one humans internal (spirit self) would know, but even then the human would not know this if they are not in tune within themselves. i know this all may sound strange but "we" as the human race should see their presence as a clear waring as to what is ahead for all human kind. i will say this that it is very close to that time and the world will not see it coming nor will we ever see anything like this again. i know a lot more then depicted within this email but the facts are the facts and its at a point being closed minded is exactly why were all are in this predicament. there are some though who walk this planet who know exactly what it is that i am saying. some who will try there best to stop it from occurring, while others push for the happening. all i can say is the truth of everything all the way to the one question to it all is this.... we the human race needs to know why it is we are all here today and why we may not be here tomorrow. its a very deep and intresting journey.
content.summary: Huge invisible craft with red-orange lights.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My friend silvia and i pulled into the mcdonalds at 220 bailey road in bay point/pittsburg and we were waiting for someone.  i got out to allow my chihuahua "chocolate" to urinate because he had been in the vehicle for awhile.  there were 2 girls parked in the aisle ahead of us and the girl on the passenger side opened her door and asked me if i knew what that was and she pointed to the sky.  there were 2 orange orbs, 1 closer to us than the other going west.  we watched as the furthest one disappeared and the other ascended.  just then another one came from the east going west (now whether it was the same one that disappeared and reappeared i don't know) and it was closer to us.  they were all circular (like a standard spaceship)and this one had the most beautiful lights that were brightening and dimming - all different colors.  it hovered for awhile and then went very very slowly westward.  there were several people in the parking lot now and they had gotten out of their vehicles and were all staring and pointing asking what is that ?

it was quite a sight for me because #1 i am a true believer but had never actually witnessed one myself and #2 i had seen 2 of these a couple of nights ago but they were very distant.  the same lights/colors.  no one believed me but now i know that i am not crazy.

i have been watching and reading almost everything there is about ufos, the paranormal, etc.

i still cannot believe that they were so close.  even though i am a true believer it is still shocking to see.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and about 12 to 15 people saw 3 ufo's w/beautifully bright colored lights dimming and brightening

content.detailedDescription:
Live south east of logan airport about 10 miles on take off and landing approach very familar with air liners also did 4 years with u.S navy aviation , with my naked eye could observe jet liners way up or  at very  high alitude and great distance where the vapor trail or contour trail like pencil mark thickness to the eye and you just can make out silver dot  with wing, if i want to get a better look i use my bincoulars for  animal watching.  i heard a low flying jet wasn
t sure of direction so i look out back !!!  no jet !! but  i saw two contour trails approaching at medium distance the thickness  of contour to nake eye look like about ten inches thich not pencil thin ,medium height !!!  never seen anything like this couldn ' t see the jets  if they were jets ??  look right ahead where trails were forming, look way ahead, look into the nose of contour trail   no jets for  a minute ,even broke out my bincouluars see could not see the planes and then all of a sudden the approaching trails stop still no plane ???  on tv about a couple hours later i heard there was aviation alert of some type ???  question do u.S have a cloaking device to be invisible to naked eyee on our sleath jets and could this be source of boons  ,maybe sonic boons ????????   i never seen anything like this before or after !!!  size  of vapor trail  the size of basketball  color greyish blue   for contour trail
content.summary: Strange two contour trail approaching and then stop and no plane ???

content.detailedDescription: We were dry camping in owls canyon in hinkley, ca. ( mojave desert ) jan. 12, 2014 and we looking at the stars when this ufo appeared, it stopped then suddenly changed color, was bouncing up and down, then it disappeared. funny thing is that right after we were getting static electricity shocks on everything. i checked on google if anyone has ever seen a ufo in owls canyon and sure enough years ago there was a sighting. never seen a ufo before but now i can say i have.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We were dry camping in owls canyon in hinkley, ca. and we looking at the stars when this ufo appeared,

content.detailedDescription:
From my balcony i witnessed this pulsating blue-green object hovering, rising slightly and finally moving from southeast to the northeast over the atlantic ocean. i was able to capture a few images of the object. it traveled without sound and split into two distinct objects before moving to far away to photograph any longer. the color changed from shades of purple to blue-green and white. the outer area was emitting a glow that grew and shrank during its movement. the timing of the pulsating was not fixed, more of a random pattern.

this is very similar to an object i saw last year in the same area only that sighting was over the gulf of mexico instead of the atlantic.
content.summary: Blue-green object traveling north separated into two objects.

content.detailedDescription: What happened is i was walking home from a friends house around 4 am in the morning i look over at the field next to my house at the sky usually i look for shooting stars or meteorites this time the most strange thing appeared a spiral white in the middle blue on the edges i watched it then a flash like a strobe light that seemed to light up the entire sky around me i didn't know what it was so i ran then went inside never told anyone i had read about a spiral online they said was a rocket what didn't make sense about what i seen is it wasn't spinning it was fixed also no sound came from it if a rocket exploded i would expect some kind of sound the flash that came off it seemed so bright like some kind of radiation coming out of whatever it was prior to this sighting i had strange dreams of seeing a ufo being stuck under it unable to move from some sort of invisible radiation that made me experience extreme pain i disregarded it as just some strange dream since i am really sceptical with ufo sightings or paranormal things now i feel like the dream was related to what i seen that night and maybe i just have no memory of what was really going on so it seemed like a dream.
content.summary: Very strange

content.detailedDescription: My 14 year old daughter, and i was driving west on west 500 north about 4 miles west of fillmore ut. it is very dark on this road, and has minimal traffic. i have seen odd lights in the sky driving west on this road at night before so i always watch the sky when driving here. i saw a strange colored object in the sky over the cricket mountain area. it was very bright. i asked my daughter if she saw the light, and she said that she did. we watched the object for about 20 minutes. it hovered, ascended, descended, and the color of the light changed between a red color, orange color, and a yellow color very fast. we watched it until it seemed to shoot down  to the ground and disappear. we were several miles from the light, and could see the light clearly. we could not make out a shape, or any other features. i have seen strange lights in the sky over the west desert here before, but never had a witness with me. i kept quiet because without a witness there was no proof. i would be happy to detail these also. i would like to find out what these lights are from.
content.summary: My 14 yo daughter,and me witnessed an odd light west of our house over the desert

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gone to bed. suddenly light appeared, as if someone flipped a light on, just over the house/yard. i did not see light approaching as if from a vehicle on the road. the light was very permeating. it infused through the curtains and lit up part of the room to about three or four feet inside the window even though the light appeared to be coming from straight overhead. the curtains are somewhat thin; but,  there is not the same effect if someone is coming down the street with shining head lights.

the light was a very intense true green like the color on the older traffic lights. the light was in the shape of a circle on the ground from the part i could see. the whole inside of the circle was lit up. there were about three or four smaller lights of a lighter/brighter green in the outline of the circle.  those were about the size of a standard overhead recessed ceiling light. i could not see a complete circle. i live in a mobile home. it appeared as if part of the circle was over our home and the home next door. our yard space is about twenty to thirty feet between the two homes.

at first i thought the light was a helicopter's search light; but, then i realized there was no sound and the light was green.

the light did not move. it did stay there for about 30 seconds. at first i was frozen in fear. i don't think i moved the curtains to look out. after about five to ten seconds i tried to focus on the details so i could share them later. i can't remember if i moved the curtains; or if i could see around the outside edge of the curtains. the light looked as if it was shining straight down the entire time.

after the light suddenly left (or the light was turned off), the fear was gone within seconds of the light leaving. i went right to sleep.  

there was never any sound before, during or after it left.

i mentioned online in a patriot group, i think it was, about the experience. someone said it was a "flying hippie" and that i've been tagged as a threat. i have been unable to find much of anything online about that with the exception of it maybe having been a small blimp, or drone.

however, like i said, there was no sound. whatever it was, was there suddenly and disappeared suddenly; or the light came on suddenly and went off suddenly.
content.summary: No sound, sudden permeating green light over yard/part of house.Circular pattern on ground w/ smaller 3-4 lighter green lights in circle outline. frozen in fear. did not see object.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from eating dinner and the moon was rising in the east and due to high winds there were clouds in the sky but the moon was visible and interesting.  we so a bright set of lights that seemed to be in an oval ribbon form on the lower right of the moon then it vanished a minute later it appeared again to the upper left of the moon with the same types of light.  the last time we saw the lights and object it was below the left side of the moon.  my wife saw the lights as well.
content.summary: Driving home and saw lights

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 22:15 on thursday 01-30-2014, i exited my side garage door to go into the house. my property is aligned east to west. i always look up into the sky to see what stars are viewable. on this night i spotted an  orange colored orb shaped object in the sky coming from the east. the object looked like 2 orbs stuck together. this object had flashing white light on top of the orb. the flashing light could have been on the back side of the object. the white flash was visible around the object, but it was brighter on top of the object than under it.

i do live in between bur & vny, and i have observed hundreds of known flying crafts and this was like nothing i have seen before. at first thought it was a helicopter, but the longer i watched the object, it did not look a helicopter in flight. not to mention the object did not make a sound. i was expecting to hear the thumping drone of a helicopter, but this thing crept silently along.   

this ufo captured my attention and i stood there watching this it for about 4 minutes as it traveled east to west. as it got closer, the object was getting bigger, and the flashing light was  either turned off or was not viewable from my position. at this time, the object began to dissolve or fade from view. not like if an object traveling away from me, but the object just ceased it exist as if it had a cloaking device.

i ran through the house to the front yard (which took about 10 seconds) to get a better view but it was gone. i ran back to the side yard and there was nothing abnormal in the sky.

it was too dark to take pictures from my cell phone.
content.summary: Ufo traveled e to w, then slowly faded as if cloaked.

content.detailedDescription: Was on my 50th birthday, went out to take a pic of the sunrise, only after i got home did i notice it
content.summary: Was taking a pic of sunrise

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work and only 6 blocks from home.
i was east bound on hawthorn blvd., when i turned left (north) on to 
29th. i drove 1 1/2 blocks, when i noticed the object forward and to the left of my truck.
i thought, what is that? and i pulled over and looked at it. i decided to drive another 1 1/2 blocks to get a better look. i pulled over, turned my truck off and heard no sound. so, i got out of my truck and took a better look. watched it traveling slowly in a northeastern path.
i was only 3 blocks from home, so i thought i go home and then spend more time watching it. i parked got out of my truck and tried to locate it.
it either changed direction or went up into the clouds ( it was totally overcast)
t was within a 1 1/2 blocks of the object and it was probably 150 feet above the ground.
it looked kind of fuzzy, as you couldn't make out any lines of the craft.
it was a bright reddish orange with bright white, but as i said, it was kind of blurred, almost an aura look to it.
it was a few minutes before 1 am.
content.summary: reddish orange with white almost like a halo around it. looked a little fuzzy, no deffinition

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the house for work.  at about 6:20am i noticed a bright light behind the mountain behind our development looking south.  it looked triangular in shape, but the brightness made it hard to observe.  as i was driving to work i keep and eye on it.  i noticed as the sunlight was getting bright, that there were no stars shinning.  the object started to rise horizontally very slowly.  when i got to work 20 minutes later (13 miles to work) the object was at an altitude of roughly 2-3000 ft. high and the sun was now higher in the horizon from the east.  the object was still shinning brightly when i entered the work place.

two hours later during my work break the object had disappeared.  i would like to mentioned that i had shown the object to several work employees when it was at its highest altitude.  i managed to take a picture with my cell phone 12 minutes after i had left the house.
content.summary: Bright hovering oject

content.detailedDescription:
New years eve, at 5 minutes after midnight, i thought what the heck, i would go out of my mobile home and enjoy the local fireworks. funny, no one else on my street was out. as i looked to the east where the local firework display was happening...Lots of booms, flairs, skyrockets etc...And then there was the large red thing...I watched it thinking it was going to be a good one (display.) as it got closer i could see the shape was almost tree like, cone in fact with an oval base, red all over. the other fireworks were still happening, and i watched as this red one started to move toward the west in a straight line...Funny, i thought, when will it explode? it just kept coming in a straight line...I watched fascinated, thought i should get my camera, but...Then it might be gone, so i watched it for about 5 minutes just come ahead...At that time it just stopped, hovered for about a minute or more in one spot. no i don't know how far it was from me, but i figure it was about a mile to two miles away, and higher in the sky than the sky rockets were shooting up. not quite as high as a jet flying over either. then it started to ascend straight up, then simply slowly winked out. 
i had thoughts of the space station lit up, but it was the wrong time of the night to see it, then i thought it was some sort of bomb, but no, it just kept its steady pace forward, hovered, then ascended upward.
i felt nothing, heard nothing other than the local fireworks, gun shots and pan banging. normal new years sounds. 
i don't know what this was, but it was there.....
thank you,
content.summary: Large red oval cone shape heading eastish to westish hovered and ascended

content.detailedDescription: I'm kicking back in my front room watching tv. when i feel and hear a very low frequency hub and vibration. i stand up turn around and looked out my back window.Approximately 30 to 50 feet away from me and a little to the left i see the most colorful scary beautiful object i've ever seen. under my breath or in my mind i said oh s*** they're real. as soon as i said or thought that a super thin bean shot out of the craft through my next door neighbors trailer and directly to my rights it's slowly started to move towards me and i thought to myself i should probably move. but i could not i was paralyzed i could move my eyes i could breathe but i could not move. the beans slowly move towards me and as soon as it hit my eyes i was laying on my floor looking straight up at my ceiling with my eyes open still paralyzed. i mumbled under my breath for my girlfriend to help me.She heard the distress in my voice and instantly started to shake me, and say my name and asking me what was wrong.Her touch broke me free of the paralytic state. i gave her short description of what happens she was kind of freaked out but not seeing it herself i'm not sure what she believed. for some strange reason i didn't talk about it for a long time didn't even think about reporting it or ask anyone else about it. but ever since that day there has been this small bb like object just underneath my skin on my right upper thigh. but there is no mark showing how it got in there. a few times since then i have had the paralyzed sensation but never seen anything like that again. the question of whether or not aliens exist or whether they are visiting this planet has been answered. there is absolutely no earthly explanation for what i saw.I am willing to take a polygraph to prove that what i am saying is truefor those who try to tell me that this was a dream. let me tell you that there was nothing unusual or out of the ordinary to make me believe that this was a dream. even if you have a dream about a real life event there's always something very peculiar in the dream like a chicken wearing a tuxedo or something just not real.Some might even say that the ufo itself was the strange thing.Say what you will but i know the difference between a dream and real life and i'm pretty sure i would have had another dream or something like that in my 42 years of life.Lucid and vivid dreams do happen but are easily discernible from real life. this was my trailer this was my backyard this was a ufo.I would very much like to know what this thing is in my leg and would love to have it removed. thank you for your time. david
content.summary: Out my back window the craziest thing i've ever seen

content.detailedDescription:
my friend, my dog, and i were driving home early in the am. she noticed and said look another ufo. i said where? she pointed south, we were travelling se at a rate of 110 km/hour. i glanced over and became fixated, so, i pulled over. the lights that were a few miles off in the distance went from green and red to white, as it approached. once it reached, its maximum distance from us, it hovered. the lights changed from white to colored again and seemed to follow a clockwise, circular motion around the craft. it began very slowly and then picked up speed. the lights were blue and red and yellow and green. it seemed to me, i was being distracted. a feeling of dread began to come over me, as we stared at it. it was an oval, shape. the lights came from the outer edge of the craft, in the middle. those lights changed from colored to white as it approached us, and then to color again as we stared at it. the craft itself appeared, flat grey, metallic. it seemed to be about a mile or less away. i would say that it was about 20 to 30 feet in diameter.
   as we watched the light show...I had a disturbing feeling of foreboding. i felt as though we were seeing something that we shouldn't be seeing. my little dog began to growl at the same time that feeling took hold of me. my friend yelled we see you !!! and i quietly said, let's get the hell outta here!! she didn't argue. which felt like a relief, because i was becoming uneasy and actually quite terrified. 
  as we pulled back onto the highway. i asked my friend if it was still there, and she said it was gone.
  this was the only time i had ever witnessed a ufo. my friend said she sees them all the time in beausejour, manitoba. i have also spoken to 2 other friends who say they see them all the time. i have noticed a military presence in the area at times, and have wondered about it, as there was no reason for them to be there. no flooding, natural dissters, etc. and furthermore, no military base either.
  i cannot provide any other evidence, but the area should be explored. i am going to start an investigation. i will be arming myself with cameras, and will diligently record times sizes distances and locations. i have no doubt i will get evidence.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My friend noticed it following us. when i pulled over it hovered.It moved closer to us, and the light show began. after 25 min. my dog began to growl. i heeded his warning and we high-tailed it. it was as though we had seen something we should not have.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work in warner robins, ga, and i glanced to the side to look at a  building and noticed something hovering. initially, i thought it might be a helicopter, as there  were two red lights at a higher elevation than three white lights, so it could have appeared  to be lights on a helicopter's tail. however, upon turning off my music and rolling down my  window, i was unable to hear anything at all, aside from the cars, and i expected that  something as large as this thing looked would make a loud enough noise to be heard above  the cars (especially a helicopter - you can hear those for a long distance).

as i continued to drive, the object started to move. as it moved, i was able to see that it  was actually shaped like a kite. it flew in such a way that had the longer sides of the 'kite' up  at a higher level so that one light moved higher than the other three. the red lights  appeared to be on the bottom, rather than higher up as it had originally appeared.

i glanced over to the left periodically (i did not pull over), and watched as the object got  farther and farther away up until it disappeared behind trees (i got stopped at a light around  the same time, which was inconvenient - by the time i was able to go, i was unable to see it  any-more).

this sighting was something that put me in awe; it was amazing to watch, and i felt very  lucky to be able to see such a long event. i wish i could be more in-depth with the report, but it was hard to observe fully with driving at the same time.

the images attached shows it hovering in the first and how it was arranged when travelling in the second.
content.summary: A kite-shaped object with regularly flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home going south on i-75 in georgia between macon and  byron. after coming over slight hill, i noticed a strong golden light  hovering over a cloud. originally, i thought that it might be a beam from the  setting sun, but i dismissed that idea, since the light was concentrated in a  small area, not stretched across the sky. then i thought perhaps it was a  light reflecting off a plane or something else that usually flies around the  area.

the object did not actually move at any point when i was looking at it.  instead, it started pulsing in a way that reminded me of how a flashlight  looks when it's going out - it would dim a little, brighten up, dim, brighten  and so forth, each time getting smaller until it winked out completely.

overall, while i was watching it, i didn't feel scared or very special one way  or another, as i have while viewing other objects. this one was almost  relaxing, and i really was unsure what to make of it. 

***

some notes on the report:

i am unsure if the object was actually reflecting or making its own light; i am  leaning towards making its own light, but i selected both, just in case.

the shape was hard to say - it looked like it had jagged edges, but that  could be from casting/reflecting light, so i can't say for certain how it really  looked; i checked all that i thought might apply ("flash" is probably the  closest option, but it reminded me of a star, too).

the size changed: it started out larger and became smaller, which is why  "starlike," "asprin" and "penny" are selected.

the most prominent colour was gold, but "yellow" was the closest listed.

as far as the direction first/last observed, i'm not sure the exact direction,  but i was travelling south (it might have been a little west or a little east, but  i was definitely going south).
content.summary: A pulsating golden light that slowly winked out.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my girlfriends driveway, replacing a speaker in my car after my work shift.  it was very cool that night, and the sky was quite clear. i was watching the sky periodically as i worked, i had seen 2 shooting stars and was watching for more, when i seen a strange movement on the horizon. i was trying very hard to figure out what would be flying so low at that time in the morning (approx. 3am). it flew in my general direction, and as it came closer i realized this wasn't one light but had unveiled itself as 5 very very dimly lit red lights (similar to the red light in the cab of a police car while trying to be stealthy). this object was moving @ the same elevation as the surrounding mountain tops. couldn't see a chassis or frame, but the object blocked out the stars it moved under and the lights were in a triangular formation. it was dead silent. couldn't hear any bugs or crickets because it was chilly and nothing was very active outside. the object flew over my head and continued moving towards town. this encounter took about 15 seconds, possibly more. my blackberry was broken so i wasn't able to snap a picture. i was very much in awe following the event, but suddenly a feeling of dread overcame me. i woke my girlfriend immediately, told her what had happened, and decided i was done and laid in bed wide awake for hours after. very crazy experience.
content.summary: Triangular, object possibly cloaked, blocked out the stars, 5 very dim red lights

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday, february 1st , i went outside on my deck to get my cat inside. it was approximately
7:00pm. there is a wooded area behind our house. i saw three circular red lights in the distance.
they weren���t moving like planes, so i assumed that they were perhaps military helicopters. i
estimate that their altitude was perhaps 2,000 feet. the other reason that i thought they were
helicopters was that they seemed fairly close together, as opposed to how planes would be. there
was cloud cover and the lights were below the clouds.

i didn���t think much of the lights until i noticed that they weren���t moving. they were in a triangular
formation with one light at the top, another light below it and to the left and a third light to the
right of the second light and a bit below it. i still thought that they must be helicopters at this point
and i kept watching because it was unusual to see three of them flying together. 

at that point, the uppermost light moved in an unusual way. from my viewpoint, it moved down
and then to the left, toward the second light. it remained there for just a couple of seconds and then
went to the right and up to it���s original position as the top light in the triangle. this movement was
very fast and struck me as being unusual for a helicopter. both times that it moved, both going down
and back up again, it followed what could be described as a reverse ���l��� shape. for example, it moved
down and then moved to the left at a 90 degree angle. after that, it followed the same path in reverse,
moving quickly to the right and then moving up at 90 degrees to get to it���s original position.

after seeing that movement, it finally occurred to me that they might not be helicopters. other than
the top light, the other two had not moved for over a minute. i thought that it would be unusual for
three helicopters to maintain position for that long. also, there were no blinking navigation lights.
just solid red lights. i listened carefully for any noise of helicopters, but there was none. three helicopters that close and at that low altitude would have made noise.

i grabbed my iphone that was nearby and started taking what i intended to be a video, but as it turned
out, there are just still photos. i have three photos of the lights and also the trees in the foreground. i went inside to get my girlfriend and have her look. i was inside for perhaps 10 seconds. when we both
got out to the deck, only one of the lights remained. after a few seconds, it was no longer visible. my
thought was that it went above the cloud cover and could no longer be seen. the other two lights may
have done the same thing while i was inside. the photos show three very defined circular red lights.
the defined circular shape was another thing that made me think they might not be helicopters because
navigation lights would be blinking and have more of a starburst type effect as opposed to being circular.
content.summary: Three red lights in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription:
Our client had cancelled on us and we were on the side of the road waiting for a phone call from the boss. i knoticed a man who looked like was taking pictures of our truck. i went to speak to him and he pointed up to two stationary objects in the sky. he told me there was alot of them before maybe six and that they looked like people skydiving. i only saw the two objects that looked like black stars that you could see through the slightly cloudy overcast sky. we were there for at least 25 minutes and the objects were in the same exact line of sight. i tried to focus my eyes as much as i could to see if i could tell what they were made of or if there was something hanging off of them. there was nothing to distinguish them. they were high up and looked small and round. they looked dark like maybe they were painted black. 
i thought at first balloons or something like that and we were all laughing.. but as time went on.. everyone started getting chills... we left about 25 minutes later but the two objects were still there.. the man recorded the event but i never got his number.
before we left one of the guys thought they were getting farther but i thought it was just clouds covering them more. honestly they were so hard to see unless someone pointed them out... that was a weird day indeed what were the chances we would see that when we should of been rushing to work like everyone else. we left and they had never moved i wonder if someone else saw these i wish i could have stayed until they left i was very  excited and wanted to see how they would move.
content.summary: I witnessed from encino on ventura blvd two stationary objects at around 8 am

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along highway 39 out of klamath falls, as i was entering the town of merrill when i noticed a pure bright white pointy edged kind of rectangular light emanating from an object (to me seemed to perfect of a light to be a kitchen window light) silhouetted by the houses behind it in a field about 50-60 feet away from me off the main road. although it was dark out still i could make out a pie plate shaped object about 20 feet in diameter with a sort of dip missing from one side. it was on that side i noticed more than two but no more than four smaller persons around it. i got the impression they were working, i did not pay too much attention to them as i slowed to make out what i was looking at. suddenly i got a stabbing feeling in me the people around the object were alarmed i had noticed them and now i was staring. i could not make them out because of the dark but i thought maybe they were a mix of children and teens or possibly women because of the height and frame, they stopped what ever it was they were doing and stood still. i entered town and lost sight temporarily. i was driving a u-haul truck and towing a car trailer, it was difficult but i made a u-turn to take a longer look at this weird object. when i returned after a time lapse of maybe 3 min. tops most likely less, it was no longer there only a kind of haze or fog remained. i scanned the sky hanging my head out the window. i noticed a blinking red beacon for aircraft like the kind all over the area on mountains and towers. this beacon was about maybe 50 feet above a closed sore or business, i stared at it realizing nothing was holding this "beacon" up, like it was trying to mock the other beacons all over the area. the flashing stopped then red and white lights came on all around the outside of the craft then began to go around the circumference of it in sequence, white then red then white... i knew it was definitely a disk at that point. the front (or what i assume was the front) tilted downward about 20 degrees and began to slowly fly off at a casual helicopter speed. i assume in order to throw me off by mocking a helicopter now. this made me laugh because it was nothing like a helicopter. i listened intently for any noise as it made no noticeable sound at all. first it flew south east, then about a mile away from me it changed direction toward where i estimate mt. shasta is from my spot along the road where i had parked, then continuing at the same speed flew out of sight from me. at that point i drove around a bit investigating the edge of town where the craft was landed, i noticed a couple of things i considered strange that may or may not have relevance to the sighting. like a man in the house closest to the landing site sitting in front of a large pain window with no blinds being completely oblivious to my accidentally getting a giant truck stuck on his front lawn when i attempted another u-turn, almost as if he were some kind of hypnotized or something. i continued on my way. once i got to the wooded area of the drive by the lava flows monument my truck lost power and slowed almost to a stop for no apparent reason at all. most of my attempts to make calls or texts were stopped short by no signal in areas signal has never been a problem for me. i felt both watched and not alone the rest of my drive to reno and occasionally still feel watched and not alone even as recently as this morning. since i have felt weary to be alone outside in the early morning dark, i don't understand why when i wasn't frightened by the event. my new camera that unfortunately didn't have battery's at the time this happened does not work anymore even after i replaced the battery's a couple times. it makes me think this thing somehow broke it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Pie plate with a kind of dip taken out of one side

content.detailedDescription:
Estabamos en la piscina flotando y mirando las nubes.

el objeto aparecio tres veces en casi el mismo horario en zona similar. 

viene del norte y frena abruptamente, queda flotando como coon una leve inercia. luego lentamente asciende y se vuelve translucido mesclandose con las nubes.

fueron 3 avistamientos durante diciembre, con practicamente el mismo comportamiento.

ocurrido tambien durante el invierno, informado por otras personas. 

apariencia de un metal similar a la plata. tengo una peque���aa filmacion de mala calidad, cuando se desvanecia.

aparecen cuando el cielo de verano se enuentra cargado de cumulus limbus.
content.summary: Objeto brillante que puede repetir su aparicion frena y luegoo asciende hasta desaparecer. metalico (resplandece sol verano) a medida que asciende se transparentiza
content.locationName: Cañada de Gómez, Santa Fe Province

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting took place in the summer between 1993 and 1998. i don't remember when exactly but i do remember the shape.
i saw it in the sky because it something looked silvery. it was a vertical cylinder with something on the surface. in the sky flying  east to west. there was no noise. it was not fast. i wanted to get a picture but it would have been gone before i had a chance. i have never seen anything like it before or since. i did not know who to contact at the time. i have no idea if i said something to my family. the object was about 200 feet away above the tree tops.
content.summary: I saw it when i was out my back door with my family there was no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching conan. to the left of our tv is a window that has a mostly unobstructed view of the sky. there are no buildings behind our apartment, and the trees are bare, which allowed me to see the sky clearly. suddenly a circular red and green light caught my eye. i believe i either saw a ufo or (more likely) a drone. it was hovering in the sky. i got up and went to the window. i pointed it out to my girlfriend, who was sitting on the couch facing away from the window, but she didn't look fast enough. once i got up, i saw the object for only a few moments, and then it flew out of my view. again, it was circular, red and green (half red, half green, shaped a lot like that old simon game), and it moved fluidly. we live not far from airports, but it was nothing like the usual air traffic (planes or helicopters) we see on a regular basis.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red green ufo or drone sighting brooklyn

content.detailedDescription: V shaped no noise as big as to football pitches.
content.summary: V shaped enormas

content.detailedDescription:
The event occurred on january 31st, 2014. 

my husband was working outside the area. he was supposed to come back on february 6th. 

i was watching tv, alone at home. time was 7 pm. it's winter here in quebec so it was dark at this time. i noticed a flash of light, much light lightning. there was no storm outside, sky was clear and i did not hear any thunder. a second flash of light lighted the whole area for at least 5 seconds. at first, i thought that the nearest electrical transformer failed because i've seen transformers fail a few time before. but no, this was not a transformer because we still had electricity. 

that did not bother me at first. i resumed watching tv. suddenly, i seen a shadow walk across the living room. i asked "richard, is that you?", thinking my husband came back from work. i looked around and nobody was here. i walked around in my house but could not find richard so i checked the parking and there was no car parked. i told to myself, i am tired. i must have been hallucinating. 

the movie i was watching ended. i decided to watch another film. it was about 15 past 10 pm and i was getting sleepy so i decided to do my nightly routine, brush my teeth and prepare my bed. i went to bed and fell asleep almost immediately.

after a few minutes, i woke up with a feeling that somebody else was inside the room. i slowly opened my eyes and saw a silhouette staring at me at the feet of my bed. i couldn't notice any feature so i snapped a picture with my phone. i was not sure if i was awake or dreaming so i closed my eyes and feel asleep for the rest of the night.

next day, i was browsing through my phone. i found out a picture taken the day before. the silhouette i saw was in fact a small humanoid being, about 4 feet tall, big eyes, staring at me. i felt sick when i remembered that i really took a picture of this being and that i immediately fell asleep after snapping this photograph. i don't remember what happened after.

i decided to post this on mufon and i wish to talk to people that witnessed the same thing that i've witnessed. i don't know what happened, because i fell asleep right after the encounter.
content.summary: Flash of light,short entity seen inside my house and time missing.

content.detailedDescription: One night i rode my a tv up to our pasture which was located on a hilltop above our home.I rode around checking our perimeter fence an then parked dead center shut off the a tv leaned back and stared up at the clear starry sky.As i smoked a cigarette i watched looking towards oklahoma state prison an saw stars seem to vanish then appear again.Located close to our home are hills that's when u could really see it was a flying craft.I couldn't believe my eyes an wished i had a witness to experience this but i was all alone that night.The craft seemed to follow the hills then came towards me.When it centered above it was huge shiny completely silent.It beamed a light down to the exact spot i had drove to when i drove to the center of our pasture.The light beam was bright white around 10ft. squared and coming directly toward me.When it shined on me i all i thought of was u don't want me up there with u i'm to crazy.The light ascended up again showing its size an only stars around it.When it moved away from me i watched how it had no affect to high grass or trees.I sat in total shock slapped my face a few times to make sure i wasn't dreaming,started the a tv up drove like hell down to tell my dad,but the closer i got i knew i couldn't tell what i had seen due to some kind of ridicule.This honestly was the coolest experience ever,i will never forget it.Thank you
content.summary: I spotted a craft flying on lake rd. in mcallister,ok which then shone a beam of light on me
